      • addDesiredConfig

        public boolean addDesiredConfig(long clusterId,
                                boolean selected,
                                String user,
                                Config config)
        Description copied from interface: Host
        Adds a desired configuration to the host instance.
        Specified by:
        addDesiredConfig in interface Host
        Parameters:
        clusterId - the cluster id that the config applies to
        selected - true if the configuration is selected. Applies only to remove the override, otherwise this value should always be true.
        user - the user making the change for audit purposes
        config - the configuration object
        Returns:
        true if the config was added, or false if the config is already set as the current

      • getDesiredConfigs

        public Map<String,DesiredConfig> getDesiredConfigs(long clusterId)
        Description copied from interface: Host
        Gets all the selected configurations for the host. return a map of type-to-DesiredConfig instances.
        Specified by:
        getDesiredConfigs in interface Host

      • getDesiredHostConfigs

        public Map<String,HostConfig> getDesiredHostConfigs(Cluster cluster,
                                                    Map<String,DesiredConfig> clusterDesiredConfigs)
                                             throws org.apache.ambari.server.AmbariException
        Get the desired configurations for the host including overrides
        Specified by:
        getDesiredHostConfigs in interface Host
        clusterDesiredConfigs - the desired configurations for the cluster. Obtaining these can be expensive and since this method operates on hosts, it could be called 1,000's of times when generating host responses. Therefore, the caller should build these once and pass them in. If null, then this method will retrieve them at runtime, incurring a performance penality.
        Returns:
        Throws:
        org.apache.ambari.server.AmbariException

      • hasComponentsAdvertisingVersions

        public boolean hasComponentsAdvertisingVersions(StackId stackId)
                                         throws org.apache.ambari.server.AmbariException
        Gets whether this host has components which advertise their version.
        Specified by:
        hasComponentsAdvertisingVersions in interface Host
        Parameters:
        stackId - the version of the stack to use when checking version advertise-ability.
        Returns:
        true if at least 1 component on this host advertises its version.
        Throws:
        org.apache.ambari.server.AmbariException - if there is a problem retrieving the component from the stack.
        See Also:
        ComponentInfo.isVersionAdvertised()

      • isRepositoryVersionCorrect

        public boolean isRepositoryVersionCorrect(RepositoryVersionEntity repositoryVersion)
                                   throws org.apache.ambari.server.AmbariException
        Gets whether all host components whose desired repository version matches the repository version specified have reported the correct version and are no longer upgrading.
        Specified by:
        isRepositoryVersionCorrect in interface Host
        Parameters:
        repositoryVersion - the repository version to check for (not null).
        Returns:
        true if all components on this host have checked in with the correct version if their desired repository matches the one specified.
        Throws:
        org.apache.ambari.server.AmbariException
